SELECT * FROM Member
AND member_phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{memberPhone}, '%')
AND member_username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{memberUsername}, '%')
AND member_role = #{memberRole}
AND member_is_active = #{memberIsActive}
AND CAST(member_created_at AS DATE) >= CAST(#{createdAtStart} AS DATE)
AND CAST(member_created_at AS DATE) <= CAST(#{createdAtEnd} AS DATE)

member_phone member_username member_role member_is_active member_created_at member_created_at
